summary: I RECIEVED A RECALL NOTICE, 14B09. I PLACE A CALL TO THE DEALERSHIP IN MY AREA, AUTO CENTER FORD, AND THEY CLAIM TO HAVE NO KNOWLEDGE OF THE RECALL. I THEN ASKED TO SPEAK WITH A MANAGER AND WAS DISCONNECTED 3 TIMES. I WAS THEN SUDDENLY, WITHOUT KNOWLEDGE, SENT TO A VOICEMAIL FOR THE SERVICE MANAGER. I LEFT MY NAME AND NUMBER WITH THE REASON FOR MY CALL AND HAVE NOT RECIEVED ANY RESPONSES.
